commit.message:
client: Pithos, Docker, Common/VM Genesis-With-Contracts Extension, Client Log Files, JSON RPC Server Separation, client node-gyp removal, Code Cleanup (#1530)

* add genesis code and storage to cli parsing/common/stateManager for pithos genesis support for deposit contract at 0x0000...0000

* small fixes

* engine code tidying

* split Engine API onto own port (default: 8550)

* add cli --extIP

* quicken eth_blockNumber

* improve speed and resilience

* add pithos folder with readme, config and docker

* add blockBuilder option to not insert block into blockchain (improves engine api speed/efficiency)

* consensusValidated: check if block exists in the canonical chain before throwing unknown header

* add lighthouse to pithos readme

* tidy / fixes / updates

* don't respond to eth protocol reqs for block ranges greater than current height (fixes geth disconnect on pithos)
i first modified the query to contain the max query size but geth didn't like the results, while valid, disconnected with subprotocol_error

* merge codeAndStorage into GenesisState

* extend builder opts from block opts, more informative rpc endpoint opened message

* update yargs to latest
clean up unneeded rpc options from config
add log file saving and rotate functionality
output client version in logger and json rpc namespaces
add basic Dockerfile and docker-compose
update libp2p-noise to new chainsafe maintained version to drop bcrypto dep which used node-gyp rebuild

* set config init with no loggers to default to level error, simplifies use (sorry about this one! getting a little carried away ^_^)
